definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_isday"/></value><value name="B"><block type="world_data_canseesky"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_get_fire_ticks"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_israining"/></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_fire"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="seconds"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
